name: Adventurer Guild The Barrier Defender
description:
If you feel delayed when play in browser try the download version, rpg maker kinda heavy with assets

As Guild Master you have a lot responsibilty, and one of them is to keep town safe.
One day you get news town get attack by monster army, the only one that make town keep safe is the crystal that hold the barrier
Cordinate your adventurer to defend the barrier!

A lot of unique tower
A lot enemy waves
and more....?

Gameplay:
It's tower defense game and instead of tower you hire adventurer and place it where you think will the most efficient to defend the crystal
Upgrade, move or sell them, it's you who decide everything

Control:
Keyboard : Arrow keys and Z,X,C
Mouse : Right click open menu, left click to action talk/walk

Credits:

LunaSense - MZ Intellisense

Source:
RPGMaker MZ source - > Download Adventurer Guild The Barrier Defender-source.zip
Tower Defense Script -> https://github.com/unwantedfriedchicken/rpgmakermz-plugins

~~~~Random note, and rambling, not important
This is my first RPG maker game I don't want to complicated and the only idea I come up with is to make tower defense game, the prologue take me so long to check grammar and make it kinda interesting. I'm so bad with story telling or english
And the gamebalance also take soooo long to balance. Try it over and over again, add new tower mean new balance for enemy wave, I'm so tired is not as fun and simple as I thought it would be
Overall I had so much fun with RPG Maker MZ, I'm still learning but for now it's fun to use, will experiment with more smaller games latter

I will upload the sourcecode and project later, if anyone want try play arround with it
